util.xml
Class XHTMLStream

java.lang.Object
  util.xml.XHTMLStream

public class XHTMLStream
extends java.lang.Object

Handles XHTML content streamed out to a Writer

Constructor Summary
XHTMLStream(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, org.w3c.dom.Element e)
          Set up automatically for the given servlet parameter and write the beginning of the XHTML file.
XHTMLStream(java.io.Writer w)
          Set up to write XHTML tags, not necessarily at the beginning of the file.

Constructor Detail

XHTMLStream

public XHTMLStream(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                   org.w3c.dom.Element e)
            throws java.io.IOException
Set up automatically for the given servlet parameter and write the beginning of the XHTML file.

Parameters:
request - Request (used to get Accept header)
response - Response (MIME type will be set)
e - Element from which root attributes are taken (may be null)
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Any problem writing to stream

XHTMLStream

public XHTMLStream(java.io.Writer w)
Set up to write XHTML tags, not necessarily at the beginning of the file.

Parameters:
w - Wrtier to use
Method Detail

tag

public void tag(java.lang.String sTag)
         throws java.io.IOException
Opens a tag with no attributes.

Parameters:
sTag - Tag name
Throws:
java.io.IOException

tag

public void tag(java.lang.String sTag,
                java.lang.String sAttributes)
         throws java.io.IOException
Opens a tag with attributes.

Parameters:
sTag - Tag name
sAttributes - List of attributes exactly as it should be written to the output, after the tag name and a space
Throws:
java.io.IOException

completeTag

public void completeTag(java.lang.String sTag,
                        java.lang.String sAttributes,
                        java.lang.String sText)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Writes a tag with (optional) attributes, and containing text.

Parameters:
sTag - Tag name
sAttributes - List of attributes exactly as it should be written to the output, after the tag name and a space. null to omit
sText - Text to insert within the tag. null to omit (this will add a closing tag with no space, rather than an empty tag).
Throws:
java.io.IOException

             throws java.io.IOException
Writes a comment

Parameters:
sComment - Comment text
Throws:
java.io.IOException

finish

public void finish(boolean bClose)
            throws java.io.IOException
Finishes off the XHTML file, optionally closing the writer.

Parameters:
bClose - If true, closes the writer
